text:
@GovAbbott Correction: Don't be a knucklehead like @GovAbbott

What you should be tweeting about:
• 2,504 new #COVID19 cases*
• 32 more deaths
• We've set record highs for hospitalizations for THREE days in a row 

* I think this is our highest in one day yet but need to confirm https://t.co/KXKrC9TqdQ
